aka: The Fabulous Life of Elisabeth Vigee Labrun
Vigée Le Brun: The Queens Painter
this_title: Le fabuleux destin de Elisabeth Vigée Le Brun
trans_title: 伊丽莎白·维吉·勒布朗的神奇命运
The Fabulous Life of Elisabeth Vigee Labrun
Vigée Le Brun: The Queens Painter
introduction: A renowned painter and a free-thinker, Elisabeth Louise Vigée Le Brun is still considered ahead of her time. Follow the artist's adventures over the course of her nearly 90-year life in this captivating docudrama.
chinese_title: 伊丽莎白·维吉·勒布朗的神奇命运
foreign_title: Le fabuleux destin de Elisabeth Vigée Le Brun
